PostToolUse.name: format-code
PostToolUse.command:
if [[ "$TOOL" == "Edit" || "$TOOL" == "Write" ]]; then
  FILE="$1"
  if [[ "$FILE" == *.ts || "$FILE" == *.tsx || "$FILE" == *.js || "$FILE" == *.jsx ]]; then
    if command -v prettier &> /dev/null; then
      prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true
    fi
  fi
fi

PostToolUse.name: validate-openapi-changes
PostToolUse.command:
if [[ "$TOOL" == "Edit" || "$TOOL" == "Write" ]]; then
  FILE="$1"
  if [[ "$FILE" == *specs/*.yaml ]]; then
    if command -v npx &> /dev/null; then
      echo "Validating OpenAPI spec: $FILE"
      npx @redocly/cli lint "$FILE" || echo "Warning: OpenAPI validation failed"
    fi
  fi
fi

UserPromptSubmit.name: api-first-reminder
UserPromptSubmit.description: Remind about API-First approach when implementing APIs
UserPromptSubmit.command:
if echo "$PROMPT" | grep -qi "api\|endpoint\|route"; then
  echo "Reminder: Follow API-First approach - ensure OpenAPI spec exists before implementation."
fi
